item.title: Add AI-generated captions to 60-second video for Instagram + minor edits - Upwork
item.description:
I have shot a short video that is less than 60 seconds of me speaking to the camera.

I want you to use an AI caption generator software to add captions (subtitles) onto the video. This is so people can watch on Instagram with the sound off.

(I would like to look at the AI-generated text to make sure that there are no spelling mistakes).

There are 1 or 2 minor video edits that I would also like you to add. Adding some B-roll into the clip, from static images that I have on file.

Hopefully this would be a job that would take you less than 40 minutes, broken into hopefully 2 periods of 20 minutes, with me checking the AI-generated text in-between.

The video is already shot, and I want someone who can edit it for me today (19 June 2024).

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
ob Post: Content Creators Needed

We are looking for skilled Content Creators to join our team. The role involves independently producing high-quality video content on specific topics.

Responsibilities:

• Produce engaging video content independently.
• Record videos with a camera on specialized topics.
• Current topics in demand are:
• Web Design (UI/UX Design) with Figma
• Ad-Creative Design
• Video Editing (Premiere Pro)
• Motion Graphics (After Effects)
• Graphic Design (Illustrator)
• Photo Editing (Lightroom and Photoshop)
• Online Marketing
• Brand Identity Design

Requirements:

• Expertise in any of the mentioned fields.
• Ability to produce content that will be posted across multiple platforms including TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube.

Compensation:

• Initially, 5-6 videos are needed.
• Each comprehensive video (approximately 6 minutes) should be edited into 5-6 segments, each under 1 minute.
• Payment is €50 for each comprehensive video, totaling approximately 6 minutes.

If you have experience in a related design topic not listed above, feel free to apply as well.

Apply now if you have the expertise and are ready to produce compelling content!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:07 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Writing, Content Creation, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, UI/UX Prototyping
Skills: Content Writing, Content Creation, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, UI/UX Prototyping
Country: Austria
click to apply

item.title: Looking for 3 Models - Product Demo / Spokesperson / Testimonial/ UGC Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for at least 3 models, all body types, to make product demos, scripted videos, and photos for our EMS Shorts designed to tone glutes. This is a great opportunity for a long-term collaboration with multiple future video projects.

Responsibilities:

- Act as a spokesperson for our scripts.
- Create video clips using the product.
- Take photos using the product.

Details:

Product: EMS shorts to tone glutes.
Target Demographic: Women aged 25 to 65.
Shipping Time: Approximately 9 days.
Product Value: $160 (you can keep the product after the job is completed).
Video Length: Around 60 seconds.
Compensation: $100 for the video + $50 for 5 hooks, totaling $150.

Future Opportunities: This job will lead to multiple future video projects.

Requirements: All applicants need to send samples of their previous jobs.

Skills:

Video Editing
Video Post-Editing
Voice-Over Narration
Final Cut Pro X
Acting
Video Production

What We're Looking For:

The first project involves creating a 1-minute scripted video, 5 hooks and 4 pictures of you using the product. The video should be spontaneous and authentic. It will be cropped to 1:1 or 4:5, so all scenes should be centred.

Guidelines for the Video:

Be genuine in your emotions and reactions.
Show enthusiasm and use the product as if incorporating it into your daily life, sharing it with excitement.
Feel free to adapt the script to make it conversational for you.
Ensure great lighting (preferably natural light).
90% of the video should feature you speaking with the camera with the product, and 10% should be demonstration sequences.
Use any normal lifestyle background for the video.
A well-lit green/blue/white mono background is fine for the pictures.
Additional Notes:

No editing, music, or digital elements are needed.
You can cut sequences while speaking if necessary.

How to Apply:
Please send us samples of your previous work. Contact us for a sample of the type of videos we need and to discuss further details.

Hope to hear from you soon!








Budget: $100
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:04 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:English, Female, Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, UGC, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: English, Female, Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, UGC, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Video and Audio Editor for Online Interviews - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video and audio editor to help us with the recording and editing of our online video interviews.
The first task is to create the recording of the online video interviews (or at least help me in configuring OBS to do so).
The main task will be to convert the interviews into high-quality audio and video podcasts. The ideal candidate should have experience in video and audio editing software, as well as a strong understanding of podcast production. Attention to detail is crucial, as the candidate will be responsible for ensuring a smooth and professional final product.
Skills required:
- Video editing
- Audio editing
- Podcast production
- Attention to detail

I will need to record 10 episodes for this first batch, each long up to one hour.

Please share a portfolio of video podcasts that you produced when applying.
Write "The Web Scraping Club podcast" in the first line of your application just to let me know that you read the whole job description.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 09:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Editor de Videos para YouTube estilo Jesse James West - Upwork
item.description:
Se busca un editor de vídeo experimentado con experiencia en el uso de Premiere Pro y After Effects.

El proyecto implicará principalmente la edición de videos que durarán entre 10 a 15 minutos.

Edición de este estilo de videos:
https://www.youtube.com/@JesseJamesWest
https://www.youtube.com/@rubenholg
https://www.youtube.com/@royki

Sería para el canal de Miguel Ramos, siguiendo un estilo de edición con sus últimos videos:
youtube.com/@miguelramosgarcia

Requerimientos clave:
- Dominio de Premiere Pro y After Effects.
- Experiencia contrastada en edición de montaje.
- Capacidad para manejar videos de larga duración.

Este proyecto requiere una combinación impecable de creatividad y habilidades técnicas, para darle vida a una historia. Doy la bienvenida a portafolios que demuestren la capacidad de involucrar a una audiencia en un viaje en cada video.


Relación a largo plazo.

Sumas puntos si consumes youtube y te gusta el contenido de emprendimiento y desarrollo personal


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 19, 2024 09:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Dubai-based Videographer Needed To Film/Record Privately Organised Adventure Day In Dubai - Upwork
item.description:
Need a skilled videographer to record, film and take photos of a private adventure day event in Dubai for 100 people.

Would be good if we can have drone video and photos too but if too many planning permissions and approvals from local authorities are needed then may not do drone.

Here are details of the adventure day.

It will be a sea, snow and desert day!

Yacht Cruise
8:00 am - 12:00 pm
4-hour private trip on a 155-foot luxury yacht to see the coast and amazing architecture and swim. Full breakfast buffet and live cooking station on board.

Indoor Ski
1:00 pm - 3:30 pm
Get on a private bus from Pier 7 Marina to Ski Dubai, Mall of the Emirates to ski on indoor ski slope. Other activities also available or you can just go shopping in the mall.

Desert Safari
3:30 pm to 9:30 pm
Pick up by private SUV to travel to desert for some dune driving with optional activities like quadbiking and sand boarding. Finish with a traditional sunset Arabic meal in the desert around a campfire with live fire show and belly dancers.

Suitable candidates will be required to record the entire day and will need to join us for the entire day from 8am to 930pm.

The group of people you will be filming and photographing are all into personal development and are high energy people with positive vibes and big missions to help the world.

Will need all soft copies of raw footage shared with us to save to our google drive account. (had bad experience last time with videographer who didn't share raw footage even though we paid him upfront).

Will need footage of day recorded and edited for a short, mini promotional video. Can discuss and agree on details.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$66.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 09:32 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Drone Videography, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Photography
Skills: Drone Videography, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Photography
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
